allow: Bash(python -c "from omegaconf import DictConfig, OmegaConf; from rl_web_agent.env import WebAgentEnv; cfg = OmegaConf.load(''rl_web_agent/conf/config.yaml''); print(''Config loaded successfully''); print(''Accounts:'', cfg.environment.accounts); env = WebAgentEnv(cfg.environment); print(''WebAgentEnv created successfully'')")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement conversation-based WebAgent with full context preservation

- Refactor WebAgent to maintain conversation history across all turns
- User messages now represent environment observations
- Model messages represent actions to execute
- Move accounts config from root to environment.accounts
- Restructure entrypoints: create entrypoints/ directory for main modules
- Add temporary directory management for browser data
- Remove dependency on full_config in WebAgentEnv constructor
- Update all WebAgentEnv instantiations to use new signature

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
